bugFixes.title: Header Task Creation → Status Change Issue
bugFixes.description: Resolved the issue where the task status was automatically changing after reopening the task panel. Now the status remains consistent.

bugFixes.title: Invite User → Invitation Not Appearing Instantly
bugFixes.description: After sending an invitation, the user request now appears immediately in the list without requiring a manual refresh.

bugFixes.title: My Tasks & Dashboard → Assignee Removal Issue
bugFixes.description: When removing a user from the task panel, the change is now instantly reflected in both the My Tasks and Dashboard task tables.

bugFixes.title: Reports → Feedback Fixes
bugFixes.description: All pending report-related feedbacks have been addressed, including layout, filters, and UI corrections for smoother performance.

improvements.title: Activity Tab → Improvements
improvements.description: The Activity Tab has been improved — logs are now displayed properly without underscores, and project activities are easier to read and understand.

improvements.title: Improvements in User Profile Section
improvements.description: The User Profile section has been redesigned with an improved layout, better organization of user information, and enhanced user experience for profile management.

improvements.title: Removed Debouncing from All Modules
improvements.description: Debouncing has been removed from all modules so that actions happen faster and issues caused by delays are avoided.

improvements.title: Invite User → Removed Workspace Option
improvements.description: The Workspace option has been removed from the Invite User flow to make it simpler and to prevent users from being added to "My Workspace" by mistake. This also allows users to create personal tasks without seeing any other users.

improvements.title: Project Edit → Remove Add Member Option
improvements.description: The "Add Member" option in Edit Project has been removed to prevent adding users to "My Workspace Project." This ensures that users can create personal tasks without viewing other users in the workspace.

improvements.title: All Projects → Redirect to Project Members Tab
improvements.description: When clicking on profile icons under the "All Projects" section, users will now be redirected directly to the Project Members tab instead of the Overview tab for quick access to member management.

improvements.title: Develop Desktop App → Download App Page Created
improvements.description: A dedicated Download App page has been developed for the Dyzo Desktop App, allowing users to easily download and install it from the website.

improvements.title: Project Task Table → Filtered List Behavior Improved
improvements.description: When a task's status is changed, it will now automatically disappear from the filtered list, ensuring an accurate and dynamic view of filtered tasks.

improvements.title: TBD – Sync All Platforms (Web / Extension / App / Desktop)
improvements.description: All features across different Dyzo platforms — Website, Extension, Mobile App, and Desktop App — are being synchronized to maintain uniform functionality and consistent behavior.

improvements.title: Duplicate Project Creation → Correct Task ID Format
improvements.description: When creating a duplicate of any project, tasks under it will now be generated correctly using the format DO-1, DO-2, DO-3, etc., maintaining proper task sequence and structure.

improvements.title: Pipeline → Added "Analytics" Tab
improvements.description: A new Analytics tab has been added to the Pipeline section, allowing users to view and analyze attached reports separately for better insights.

improvements.title: Section Task → Handle Task Permission & Access Level
improvements.description: Enhanced permission control for section-level tasks to ensure only authorized users can perform specific task-related actions.

improvements.title: Project Assignment → Notification to Assigned User
improvements.description: When a user is assigned to a project, they now receive an automatic notification, ensuring they are immediately informed about new project allocations.

improvements.title: SOPs to be Added to Dyzo
improvements.description: SOPs (Standard Operating Procedures) will be integrated into Dyzo as per the list to be provided by CG for better process standardization.

bugFixes.title: Comment Dropdown → Overlap Issue Fixed
bugFixes.description: Comment dropdowns no longer overlap other UI elements.

bugFixes.title: Dashboard → Task Panel → Assigned Users Removed Issue
bugFixes.description: Assigned users now remain visible even after closing and reopening the assignee list in the Task Panel.

bugFixes.title: My Tasks → Text Edit Not Saving
bugFixes.description: Typing text after existing content and clicking outside now saves the changes properly.

bugFixes.title: Project Task Table → Section Task Count Auto-Update
bugFixes.description: The task count in a section updates immediately after creating a new task — no refresh needed.

bugFixes.title: Moving Tasks Between Sections → Double Success Message
bugFixes.description: Now only one success message appears when moving tasks from one section to another.

bugFixes.title: Project Task Table → Manual Time Entry Not Updating
bugFixes.description: When time is added manually, it updates instantly without requiring a page refresh.

bugFixes.title: Inbox → Unread Count Issue
bugFixes.description: Unread notification count now clears automatically once all notifications are read.

bugFixes.title: Project Members Tab → Member Save Issue
bugFixes.description: Members added to a project remain saved even after switching to another tab.

bugFixes.title: Export Project → Removed Unnecessary Fields
bugFixes.description: Exported project files now include only essential fields, improving file readability.

bugFixes.title: Reply Comment Box → Cursor Disappear Issue
bugFixes.description: The cursor remains visible after pasting a comment link in the reply box.

improvements.title: Inbox → Categorization of Notifications
improvements.description: Notifications in the Inbox are now categorized for better clarity and easy tracking.

improvements.title: Edit Comment → Mention Improvement
improvements.description: While editing comments, the mention feature now works smoothly, showing accurate user suggestions.

improvements.title: Add Time Log & Timesheet Timer → Improved Format
improvements.description: The time log and timer display have been enhanced for better readability and time-tracking accuracy.

improvements.title: Company Working Hours API → Added Daily Working Hours Breakdown
improvements.description: The API now provides a date-wise (daily) breakdown of working hours for detailed reporting and analysis.

improvements.title: Browser Tab → Show Project Name on Change
improvements.description: The browser tab now updates dynamically to display the current project name when switching projects.

improvements.title: Timesheet Report → Added Copy Icon for Task Name
improvements.description: A copy icon is added beside each task name in the Timesheet Report, making it easy to copy task titles directly.

improvements.title: Section → Collapsed State with + Icon
improvements.description: When a section is collapsed, a + icon appears. Clicking it expands the section and opens a blank row to quickly add a new task.

improvements.title: Project Progress Calculation Updated
improvements.description: The calculation for project progress has been refined to reflect more accurate completion percentages.

improvements.title: Allow Project Creation for All User Types
improvements.description: All user types can now create projects without any restrictions.

improvements.title: User Deletion → Confirmation & (Deleted) Tag Display
improvements.description: Before deleting a user, a warning confirmation appears. Once deleted, the user is shown as User (deleted) under Comments, Notes, and Project Overview to maintain history.

improvements.title: All Projects → Hover on Profile Icons to Show Assigned Users
improvements.description: Hovering over profile icons in the "All Projects" section now displays the names of the users assigned to that project.

improvements.title: Add User Option → Improved Flow
improvements.description: If a member is missing from a project in the My Tasks assignee dropdown, an Add Member option appears. Clicking it redirects to the Project Members tab for that project, where users can directly invite new members using the Invite User option.

bugFixes.title: Correct Task ID in Trash

bugFixes.title: New Project Member not showing on Dashboard

bugFixes.title: Dashboard → Projects → Members redirection

bugFixes.description: Fixed tooltip positioning issue on the Add Project page, ensuring proper guidance and user assistance.
